use.describe: Template package to create your with

packages.describe: Additional Packages to use when building your template

default.describe: Use all default answers to all prompts

name.describe: Name for template rendering. defaults to base name of the destination path

force.describe: force the template to be made. This will override any files that tps needs to create

wipe.describe: force the template to be made. This will delete the directory if exists
